alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 4:29AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MONDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM Monday to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
